name: expandjs
description: This is a set of functions, designed to enhance your JavaScript programming experience.
author: ExpandJS <dev@expandjs.com> (http://www.expandjs.com)

scripts.browserify: npm run build && browserify bin > dist/expandjs.js && npm run browserify-min
scripts.browserify-min: npm run build && browserify -d bin -p [minifyify --map expandjs.min.map --output dist/expandjs.min.map] > dist/expandjs.min.js
